remarks.para: May be inoperative secured closed provided APU is not used.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Use external power and air for engine start.
If EEC CLNG SUP FAN status message displayed, it can be cleared by rotating the EQUIP COOLING switch to OVRD, then back to NORM.
If any RECIRC FAN UPR or LWR status message is displayed, momentarily depress the PACK RST switch until each has cleared.
APU is not be used.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to APU Selector Switch: "APU DOOR INOP CLOSED". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: See AMM 09-11-00 for towing aircraft if APU not used.

numlitem.para: If door closing is required, refer to AMM 49-15-00/201 and perform following steps:
With manual drive actuator installed:
Open the P83 panel circuit breakers: AIR INLET DOOR, APU PRIMARY CONT, and APU START.
Open P6 main power supply panel circuit breaker APU ALTN CONT.
Open APU access doors.
Remove access cover (located on top external surface of actuator canister).
With 1/4 inch square drive, turn the transfer socket to the MANUAL position.

para.emphasis: MAKE SURE TO SET THE TRANSFER SOCKET TO THE MANUAL POSITION BEFORE YOU OPERATE THE ACTUATOR WITH YOUR HANDS. DAMAGE TO THE ACTUATOR CAN OCCUR.

numlitem.para: With 1/4 inch square drive, engage socket on actuator and using 25-pound inches (2.8 N.M) or less of torque, turn socket counterclockwise until the door is closed.

para.emphasis: DO NOT GO ABOVE 25 POUND-INCHES (2.8 N.M) OF TORQUE WHEN YOU TURN THE ACTUATOR SOCKET. THE TORQUE THAT IS NECESSARY TO TURN THE CRANK WILL INCREASE AS THE ACTUATOR ROD BECOMES FULLY EXTENDED. DAMAGE CAN OCCUR IF YOU APPLY TOO MUCH TORQUE ON THE CRANK.

numlitem.para: Remove 1/4 inch drive from actuator socket.
With 1/4 inch square drive, turn the transfer socket to the ELECTRICAL position.
Install the access cover.
Close P6 main power supply panel circuit breaker APU ALTN CONT.
Close the P83 panel circuit breakers: AIR INLET DOOR, APU PRIMARY CONT, and APU START.
Close the APU access doors.
If manual drive is not installed or door cannot be operated manually, refer to AMM 49-15-00/201 and perform following steps:
Open the P83 panel circuit breakers: AIR INLET DOOR, APU PRIMARY CONT, and APU START.
Open P6 main power supply panel circuit breaker APU ALTN CONT.
Remove actuator and install fixed link to secure door closed.
Use Boeing Tool MIT65B98813 for fixed link, or manufacture per drawing below.
Close P6 main power supply panel circuit breaker APU ALTN CONT.
Close the P83 panel circuit breakers: AIR INLET DOOR, APU PRIMARY CONT, and APU START.
Close the APU access doors.
